2961 /*
2962  * xboot_register_client () - register a client
2963  *
2964  * return : transaction index or NULL_TRAN_INDEX in the case of error.
2965  *
2966  * client_credential(in): Client's credential (see boot.h)
2967  * client_lock_wait(in): Wait for at least this number of milliseconds to acquire
2968  * a lock. Negative value is infinite
2969  * client_isolation(in): Isolation level. One of the following:
2970  * TRAN_REPEATABLE_READ
2971  * TRAN_READ_COMMITTED
2972  * TRAN_SERIALIZABLE
2973  * tran_state(out): State of transaction
2974  * server_credential(out): Server's credential (see boot.h)
2975  *
2976  * Note: If the CUBRID server is not already restarted, it is
2977  * restarted. The calling client is registered and a transaction
2978  * index is assigned to the client. If the last transaction
2979  * executed on behalf of the client has client loose ends
2980  * recovery tasks, such transaction is assigned to the client and
2981  * and the transaction state is returned as a side effect.
2982  */
2983 int
2984 xboot_register_client (THREAD_ENTRY * thread_p, BOOT_CLIENT_CREDENTIAL * client_credential, int client_lock_wait,
2985  TRAN_ISOLATION client_isolation, TRAN_STATE * tran_state,
2986  BOOT_SERVER_CREDENTIAL * server_credential)
2987 {
2988  int tran_index;
2989  char *db_user_save;
2990  char db_user_upper[DB_MAX_IDENTIFIER_LENGTH] = { '\0' };
2991 #if defined(SA_MODE)
2992  char *adm_prg_file_name = NULL;
2993  CHECK_ARGS check_coll_and_timezone = { true, true };
2994 #endif /* SA_MODE */
2995 
2996 #if defined(SA_MODE)
2997  if (client_credential != NULL && client_credential->program_name != NULL
2998  && client_credential->client_type == BOOT_CLIENT_ADMIN_UTILITY)
2999  {
3000  adm_prg_file_name = client_credential->program_name + strlen (client_credential->program_name) - 1;
3001  while (adm_prg_file_name > client_credential->program_name && *adm_prg_file_name != PATH_SEPARATOR)
3002  {
3003  adm_prg_file_name--;
3004  }
3005 
3006  if (*adm_prg_file_name == PATH_SEPARATOR)
3007  {
3008  adm_prg_file_name++;
3009  }
3010  }
3011  if (adm_prg_file_name != NULL)
3012  {
3013  if (strncasecmp (adm_prg_file_name, "synccolldb", strlen ("synccolldb")) == 0
3014  || strncasecmp (adm_prg_file_name, "migrate_", strlen ("migrate_")) == 0)
3015  {
3016  check_coll_and_timezone.check_db_coll = false;
3017  }
3018  if (strncasecmp (adm_prg_file_name, "gen_tz", strlen ("gen_tz")) == 0)
3019  {
3020  check_coll_and_timezone.check_timezone = false;
3021  }
3022  }
3023 
3024  /* If the server is not restarted, restart the server at this moment */
3025  if (!BO_IS_SERVER_RESTARTED ()
3026  && boot_restart_server (thread_p, false, client_credential->db_name, false, &check_coll_and_timezone,
3027  NULL) != NO_ERROR)
3028  {
3029  *tran_state = TRAN_UNACTIVE_UNKNOWN;
3030  return NULL_TRAN_INDEX;
3031  }
3032 #else /* SA_MODE */
3033  /* If the server is not restarted, returns an error */
3034  if (!BO_IS_SERVER_RESTARTED ())
3035  {
3036  *tran_state = TRAN_UNACTIVE_UNKNOWN;
3037  return NULL_TRAN_INDEX;
3038  }
3039 #endif /* SA_MODE */
3040 
3041  /* Initialize scan function pointers of show statements */
3042  showstmt_scan_init ();
3043 
3044  db_user_save = client_credential->db_user;
3045  if (client_credential->db_user != NULL)
3046  {
3047  intl_identifier_upper (client_credential->db_user, db_user_upper);
3048  client_credential->db_user = db_user_upper;
3049  }
3050 
3051  /* Assign a transaction index to the client */
3052  tran_index =
3053  logtb_assign_tran_index (thread_p, NULL_TRANID, TRAN_ACTIVE, client_credential, tran_state, client_lock_wait,
3054  client_isolation);
3055 #if defined (SERVER_MODE)
3056  if (thread_p->conn_entry->status != CONN_OPEN)
3057  {
3058  /* the connection is going down. stop it */
3059  logtb_release_tran_index (thread_p, tran_index);
3060  tran_index = NULL_TRAN_INDEX;
3061  }
3062 #endif /* SERVER_MODE */
3063 
3064  if (tran_index != NULL_TRAN_INDEX)
3065  {
3066 #if defined (SERVER_MODE)
3067  thread_p->conn_entry->set_tran_index (tran_index);
3068 #endif /* SERVER_MODE */
3069  server_credential->db_full_name = boot_Db_full_name;
3070  server_credential->host_name = boot_Host_name;
3071  server_credential->lob_path = boot_Lob_path;
3072  server_credential->process_id = getpid ();
3073  COPY_OID (&server_credential->root_class_oid, &boot_Db_parm->rootclass_oid);
3074  if (boot_find_root_heap (&(server_credential->root_class_hfid)) != NO_ERROR
3075  || HFID_IS_NULL (&(server_credential->root_class_hfid)))
3076  {
3077  *tran_state = TRAN_UNACTIVE_UNKNOWN;
3078  return NULL_TRAN_INDEX;
3079  }
3080 
3081  server_credential->page_size = IO_PAGESIZE;
3082  server_credential->log_page_size = LOG_PAGESIZE;
3083  server_credential->disk_compatibility = rel_disk_compatible ();
3084 #if defined (SERVER_MODE)
3085  server_credential->ha_server_state = css_ha_server_state ();
3086 #else
3087  server_credential->ha_server_state = (HA_SERVER_STATE) prm_get_integer_value (PRM_ID_HA_SERVER_STATE);
3088 #endif
3089  memcpy (server_credential->server_session_key, boot_Server_session_key, SERVER_SESSION_KEY_SIZE);
3090  server_credential->db_charset = lang_charset ();
3091  server_credential->db_lang = (char *) lang_get_Lang_name ();
3092 
3093 #if defined(SERVER_MODE)
3094  /* Check the server's state for HA action for this client */
3095  if (BOOT_NORMAL_CLIENT_TYPE (client_credential->client_type))
3096  {
3097  if (css_check_ha_server_state_for_client (thread_p, 1) != NO_ERROR)
3098  {
3099  logtb_release_tran_index (thread_p, tran_index);
3100  er_log_debug (ARG_FILE_LINE, "xboot_register_client: css_check_ha_server_state_for_client() error\n");
3101  *tran_state = TRAN_UNACTIVE_UNKNOWN;
3102  client_credential->db_user = db_user_save;
3103  return NULL_TRAN_INDEX;
3104  }
3105  }
3106  if (client_credential->client_type == BOOT_CLIENT_LOG_APPLIER)
3107  {
3108  css_notify_ha_log_applier_state (thread_p, HA_LOG_APPLIER_STATE_UNREGISTERED);

3113  client_credential->process_id, client_credential->host_name, tran_index);
3114  }

3124 /*
3125  * xboot_unregister_client () - unregister a client
3126  *
3127  * return : NO_ERROR if all OK, ER_ status otherwise
3128  *
3129  * thread_p (in/out) : input thread entry; outputs NULL if thread is finalized (SA_MODE)
3130  * tran_index(in): Client transaction index
3131  *
3132  * Note: A client is unregistered. Any active transactions on that
3133  * client are aborted. This function is called when a client is
3134  * disconnected or when a crash of the client is detected by the
3135  * CUBRID server, to release resources acquired such as locks,
3136  * and allocated memory, on behalf of the client.
3137  */
3138 int
3139 xboot_unregister_client (REFPTR (THREAD_ENTRY, thread_p), int tran_index)
3140 {
3141  int save_index;
3142  LOG_TDES *tdes;
3143 #if defined(SERVER_MODE)
3144  int client_id;
3145  CSS_CONN_ENTRY *conn;
3146 #endif /* SERVER_MODE */
3147 
3148  if (BO_IS_SERVER_RESTARTED () && tran_index != NULL_TRAN_INDEX)
3149  {
3150  save_index = LOG_FIND_THREAD_TRAN_INDEX (thread_p);
3151 
3152  LOG_SET_CURRENT_TRAN_INDEX (thread_p, tran_index);
3153  tdes = LOG_FIND_TDES (tran_index);
3154 #if defined(SERVER_MODE)
3155  conn = thread_p->conn_entry;
3156  client_id = (conn != NULL) ? conn->client_id : -1;
3157  if (tdes == NULL || tdes->client_id != client_id)
3158  {
3159  thread_p->tran_index = save_index;
3160 
3161 #if defined(ENABLE_SYSTEMTAP)
3162  CUBRID_CONN_END (-1, "NULL");
3163 #endif /* ENABLE_SYSTEMTAP */
3164 
3165  return NO_ERROR;
3166  }
3167 
3168  /* check if the client was a log applier */
3169  if (tdes->client.client_type == BOOT_CLIENT_LOG_APPLIER)
3170  {
3171  css_notify_ha_log_applier_state (thread_p, HA_LOG_APPLIER_STATE_UNREGISTERED);
3172  }
3173  /* Check the server's state for HA action for this client */
3174  if (BOOT_NORMAL_CLIENT_TYPE (tdes->client.client_type))
3175  {
3176  if (css_check_ha_server_state_for_client (thread_p, 2) != NO_ERROR)
3177  {
3178  er_log_debug (ARG_FILE_LINE, "xboot_unregister_client: css_check_ha_server_state_for_client() error\n");
3179  }
3180  }
3181 #else
3182  if (tdes == NULL)
3183  {
3184 #if defined(ENABLE_SYSTEMTAP)
3185  CUBRID_CONN_END (-1, "NULL");
3186 #endif /* ENABLE_SYSTEMTAP */
3187 
3188  return NO_ERROR;
3189  }
3190 #endif /* SERVER_MODE */
3191 
3192  /* If the transaction is active abort it */
3193  if (LOG_ISTRAN_ACTIVE (tdes)) /* logtb_is_current_active (thread_p) */
3194  {
3195  (void) xtran_server_abort (thread_p);
3196  }
3197 
3198  perfmon_stop_watch (thread_p);
3199 
3200 #if defined(ENABLE_SYSTEMTAP) && defined(SERVER_MODE)
3201  CUBRID_CONN_END (client_id, tdes->client.db_user);
3202 #endif /* ENABLE_SYSTEMTAP */
3203 
3204  /* Release the transaction index */
3205  logtb_release_tran_index (thread_p, tran_index);
3206 
3207  LOG_SET_CURRENT_TRAN_INDEX (thread_p, save_index);
3208  }
3209 
3210 #if defined(CUBRID_DEBUG)
3211  boot_check_db_at_num_shutdowns (false);
3212 #endif /* CUBRID_DEBUG */
3213 
3214 #if defined(SA_MODE)
3215  (void) xboot_shutdown_server (thread_p, ER_ALL_FINAL);
3216 #endif /* SA_MODE */
3217 
3218  return NO_ERROR;
3219 }

3256 #if defined(CUBRID_DEBUG)
3257 /*
3258  * boot_check_db_at_num_shutdowns () - run checkdb when a number of client
3259  * shutdowns has been executed.
3260  * This is a debugging function.
3261  *
3262  * force_nshutdowns(in): true if only forcing is desired.
3263  *
3264  * Note: Run checkdb when a number of client shutdowns has been
3265  * executed (at the same or across several server sessions) and
3266  * the env variable CUBRID_CHECKDB_ATNUM_SHUTDOWNS has a value
3267  * greater than zero at the server process. The environment value
3268  * indicates when to execute the checkdb.
3269  *
3270  * Side-effect: A file with the name ".checkdb_num_shutdowns" is created to
3271  * to save the number of client shutdowns. This file is removed
3272  * once the above env variable is not set.
3273  * Note this file is not associated with a particular database.
3274  * Therefore, the file could be modified (and removed) by several
3275  * servers (databases). This will work OK, for most practical
3276  * purposes. No a good reason, why it was implemented this way.
3277  * The author was lazy and it was for debugging only.
3278  */
3279 static void
3280 boot_check_db_at_num_shutdowns (bool force_nshutdowns)
3281 {
3282  const char *env_value;
3283  const char *checkdb_file_num_shutdowns = ".checkdb_num_shutdowns";
3284  FILE *fp;
3285  static int checkdb_every_nshutdowns = -1;
3286  static int num_current_shutdowns = -1;
3287 
3288  if (force_nshutdowns == true)
3289  {
3290  if (checkdb_every_nshutdowns > 0 && (fp = fopen (checkdb_file_num_shutdowns, "w")) != NULL)
3291  {
3292  fprintf (fp, "%d", num_current_shutdowns);
3293  fclose (fp);
3294  }
3295  return;
3296  }
3297 
3298  /*
3299  * Check the consistency of the database when the client is unregister
3300  */
3301 
3302  if (checkdb_every_nshutdowns == -1)
3303  {
3304  env_value = envvar_get ("CHECKDB_EVERY_NSHUTDOWNS");
3305  if (env_value != NULL)
3306  {
3307  checkdb_every_nshutdowns = atoi (env_value);
3308  }
3309  else
3310  {
3311  checkdb_every_nshutdowns = 0;
3312  }
3313 
3314  if (checkdb_every_nshutdowns <= 0)
3315  {
3316  checkdb_every_nshutdowns = 0; /* Don't check at all */
3317  (void) remove (checkdb_file_num_shutdowns);
3318  return;
3319  }
3320 
3321  fp = fopen (checkdb_file_num_shutdowns, "r");
3322  if (fp != NULL)
3323  {
3324  if (fscanf (fp, "%d", &num_current_shutdowns) != 1)
3325  {
3326  num_current_shutdowns = 0;
3327  }
3328  }
3329  else
3330  {
3331  num_current_shutdowns = 0;
3332  }
3333  }
3334 
3335  if (checkdb_every_nshutdowns > 0)
3336  {
3337  num_current_shutdowns++;
3338 
3339  if (num_current_shutdowns == checkdb_every_nshutdowns)
3340  {
3341  num_current_shutdowns = 0;
3342  if (xboot_check_db_consistency () != NO_ERROR)
3343  {
3344  const char *tmpname;
3345  fflush (stderr);
3346  fflush (stdout);
3347  tmpname = er_get_msglog_filename ();
3348  if (tmpname == NULL)
3349  {
3350  tmpname = "/dev/null";
3351  }
3352  fprintf (stdout,
3353  "Some inconsistencies were detected in your database.\n Please consult error_log file = %s"
3354  " for additional information\n", tmpname);
3355  fflush (stdout);
3356  /*
3357  * The following is added so we can attach to the debugger on
3358  * a fatal error. It is of great help to stop execution when
3359  * running a set of sql scripts. (That is, find the script that
3360  * leave the DB inconsistent).
3361  */
3362  er_set (ER_FATAL_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, ER_GENERIC_ERROR, 0);
3363  }
3364  }
3365  }
3366 }
3367 #endif /* CUBRID_DEBUG */

3375 /*
3376  * xboot_checkdb_table () - check consistency of table
3377  * as much as possible
3378  *
3379  * return :
3380  *
3381  */
3382 DISK_ISVALID
3383 xboot_checkdb_table (THREAD_ENTRY * thread_p, int check_flag, OID * oid, BTID * index_btid)
3384 {
3385  int error_code;
3386  HFID hfid;
3387  bool repair = check_flag & CHECKDB_REPAIR;
3388  DISK_ISVALID allvalid, valid;
3389  HEAP_SCANCACHE scan_cache;
3390  RECDES peek_recdes;
3391 
3392  allvalid = DISK_VALID;
3393 
3394  if (check_flag & CHECKDB_CHECK_PREV_LINK)
3395  {
3396  valid = btree_repair_prev_link (thread_p, oid, index_btid, CHECK_ONLY);
3397  if (valid == DISK_ERROR)
3398  {
3399  return DISK_ERROR;
3400  }
3401  if (valid != DISK_VALID)
3402  {
3403  allvalid = valid;
3404  }
3405  }
3406 
3407  if (check_flag & CHECKDB_REPAIR_PREV_LINK)
3408  {
3409  valid = btree_repair_prev_link (thread_p, oid, index_btid, REPAIR_ALL);
3410  if (valid == DISK_ERROR)
3411  {
3412  return DISK_ERROR;
3413  }
3414  if (valid != DISK_VALID)
3415  {
3416  allvalid = valid;
3417  }
3418  }
3419 
3420  if (heap_get_hfid_from_class_oid (thread_p, oid, &hfid) != NO_ERROR || HFID_IS_NULL (&hfid))
3421  {
3422  return DISK_ERROR;
3423  }
3424 
3425  if (index_btid == NULL)
3426  {
3427  /* if index name was specified, skip checking heap file */
3428  if (lock_object (thread_p, oid, oid_Root_class_oid, IS_LOCK, LK_UNCOND_LOCK) != LK_GRANTED)
3429  {
3430  return DISK_ERROR;
3431  }
3432  error_code = heap_scancache_quick_start_root_hfid (thread_p, &scan_cache);
3433  if (error_code != NO_ERROR)
3434  {
3435  lock_unlock_object (thread_p, oid, oid_Root_class_oid, IS_LOCK, true);
3436  return DISK_ERROR;
3437  }
3438  /* Check heap file is really exist. It can be removed. */
3439  if (heap_get_class_record (thread_p, oid, &peek_recdes, &scan_cache, PEEK) != S_SUCCESS)
3440  {
3441  heap_scancache_end (thread_p, &scan_cache);
3442  lock_unlock_object (thread_p, oid, oid_Root_class_oid, IS_LOCK, true);
3443  return DISK_ERROR;
3444  }
3445  heap_scancache_end (thread_p, &scan_cache);
3446 
3447  valid = heap_check_heap_file (thread_p, &hfid);
3448  if (valid == DISK_ERROR)
3449  {
3450  lock_unlock_object (thread_p, oid, oid_Root_class_oid, IS_LOCK, true);
3451  return DISK_ERROR;
3452  }
3453  if (valid != DISK_VALID)
3454  {
3455  allvalid = valid;
3456  }
3457 
3458  lock_unlock_object (thread_p, oid, oid_Root_class_oid, IS_LOCK, true);
3459  }
3460 
3461  valid = btree_check_by_class_oid (thread_p, oid, index_btid);
3462  if (valid == DISK_ERROR)
3463  {
3464  return DISK_ERROR;
3465  }
3466  if (valid != DISK_VALID)
3467  {
3468  allvalid = valid;
3469  }
3470 
3471  valid = locator_check_by_class_oid (thread_p, oid, &hfid, index_btid, repair);
3472  if (valid == DISK_ERROR)
3473  {
3474  return DISK_ERROR;
3475  }
3476  if (valid != DISK_VALID)
3477  {
3478  allvalid = valid;
3479  }
3480 
3481  return allvalid;
3482 }

3501 /*
3502  * xboot_check_db_consistency () - check consistency of database
3503  * as much as possible
3504  *
3505  * return : NO_ERROR if all OK, ER_ status otherwise
3506  *
3507  */
3508 int
3509 xboot_check_db_consistency (THREAD_ENTRY * thread_p, int check_flag, OID * oids, int num_oids, BTID * index_btid)
3510 {
3511  DISK_ISVALID isvalid = DISK_VALID;
3512  int i;
3513  bool repair = check_flag & CHECKDB_REPAIR;
3514  int error_code = NO_ERROR;
3515 
3516  disk_lock_extend ();
3517  error_code = boot_check_permanent_volumes (thread_p);
3518  disk_unlock_extend ();
3519 
3520  isvalid = disk_check (thread_p, repair);
3521  if (isvalid != DISK_VALID)
3522  {
3523  ASSERT_ERROR_AND_SET (error_code);
3524  }
3525 
3526  if (index_btid != NULL && BTID_IS_NULL (index_btid))
3527  {
3528  index_btid = NULL;
3529  }
3530 
3531  if (num_oids > 0)
3532  {
3533  for (i = 0; i < num_oids; i++)
3534  {
3535  if (OID_ISNULL (&oids[i]))
3536  {
3537  continue;
3538  }
3539  isvalid = xboot_checkdb_table (thread_p, check_flag, &oids[i], index_btid);
3540 
3541  if (isvalid != DISK_VALID)
3542  {
3543  error_code = ER_FAILED;
3544  }
3545  }
3546  return error_code;
3547  }
3548 
3549  if (check_flag & CHECKDB_CHECK_PREV_LINK)
3550  {
3551  if (isvalid != DISK_ERROR)
3552  {
3553  isvalid = btree_repair_prev_link (thread_p, NULL, NULL, CHECK_ONLY);
3554  if (isvalid != DISK_VALID)
3555  {
3556  error_code = ER_FAILED;
3557  }
3558  }
3559  }
3560 
3561  if (check_flag & CHECKDB_REPAIR_PREV_LINK)
3562  {
3563  if (isvalid != DISK_ERROR)
3564  {
3565  isvalid = btree_repair_prev_link (thread_p, NULL, NULL, REPAIR_ALL);
3566  if (isvalid != DISK_VALID)
3567  {
3568  error_code = ER_FAILED;
3569  }
3570  }
3571  }
3572 
3573  if (check_flag & CHECKDB_FILE_TRACKER_CHECK)
3574  {
3575  if (isvalid != DISK_ERROR)
3576  {
3577  isvalid = file_tracker_check (thread_p);
3578  if (isvalid != DISK_VALID)
3579  {
3580  assert (isvalid != DISK_INVALID);
3581  ASSERT_ERROR_AND_SET (error_code);
3582  }
3583  }
3584  }
3585 
3586  if (check_flag & CHECKDB_HEAP_CHECK_ALLHEAPS)
3587  {
3588  if (isvalid != DISK_ERROR)
3589  {
3590  isvalid = heap_check_all_heaps (thread_p);
3591  if (isvalid != DISK_VALID)
3592  {
3593  error_code = ER_FAILED;
3594  }
3595  }
3596  }
3597 
3598  if (check_flag & CHECKDB_CT_CHECK_CAT_CONSISTENCY)
3599  {
3600  if (isvalid != DISK_ERROR)
3601  {
3602  isvalid = catalog_check_consistency (thread_p);
3603  if (isvalid != DISK_VALID)
3604  {
3605  error_code = ER_FAILED;
3606  }
3607  }
3608  }
3609 
3610  if (check_flag & CHECKDB_BTREE_CHECK_ALL_BTREES)
3611  {
3612  if (isvalid != DISK_ERROR)
3613  {
3614  isvalid = btree_check_all (thread_p);
3615  if (isvalid != DISK_VALID)
3616  {
3617  error_code = ER_FAILED;
3618  }
3619  }
3620  }
3621 
3622  if (check_flag & CHECKDB_LC_CHECK_CLASSNAMES)
3623  {
3624  if (isvalid != DISK_ERROR)
3625  {
3626  isvalid = locator_check_class_names (thread_p);
3627  if (isvalid != DISK_VALID)
3628  {
3629  error_code = ER_FAILED;
3630  }
3631  }
3632  }
3633 
3634  if (check_flag & CHECKDB_LC_CHECK_ALLENTRIES_OF_ALLBTREES)
3635  {
3636  if (isvalid != DISK_ERROR)
3637  {
3638  isvalid = locator_check_all_entries_of_all_btrees (thread_p, repair);
3639  if (isvalid != DISK_VALID)
3640  {
3641  error_code = ER_FAILED;
3642  }
3643  }
3644  }
3645 
3646  return error_code;
3647 }

3649 /*
3650  * boot_server_all_finalize () - terminate every single module
3651  * except the log/recovery manager
3652  * is_er_final(in): Terminate the error module..
3653  * shutdown_common_modules(in): Terminate all common modules (for SA mode)
3654  * if SERVER_MODE, this is implied BOOT_SHUTDOWN_ALL_MODULES.
3655  *
3656  * Note: Every single module except the log/recovery manager are
3657  * uninitialized. All data volumes are unmounted.
3658  */
3659 void
3660 boot_server_all_finalize (THREAD_ENTRY * thread_p, ER_FINAL_CODE is_er_final,

3671  disk_manager_final ();
3672  boot_server_status (BOOT_SERVER_DOWN);
3673 
3674  catcls_finalize_class_oid_to_oid_hash_table (thread_p);
3675  serial_finalize_cache_pool ();
3676  partition_cache_finalize (thread_p);
3677 
3678  // return lock-free transaction and destroy the system.
3679  thread_return_lock_free_transaction_entries ();
3680  lf_destroy_transaction_systems ();
3681 
3682 #if defined(SERVER_MODE)
3683  /* server mode shuts down all modules */
3684  shutdown_common_modules = BOOT_SHUTDOWN_ALL_MODULES;
3685 #endif /* SERVER_MODE */
3686 
3687  if (shutdown_common_modules == BOOT_SHUTDOWN_ALL_MODULES)

3698  er_final (ER_ALL_FINAL);
3699  }
3700  lang_final ();
3701  tz_unload ();
3702  }

3706  event_log_final ();

3710 /*
3711  * xboot_backup () - a fuzzy backup of the database
3712  *
3713  * return : NO_ERROR if all OK, ER_ status otherwise
3714  *
3715  * backup_path(in): Location where information volumes are backed up. If NULL is given, the following defaults
3716  * are assumed to back up each information volume:
3717  * - If file "fileof_vols_and_backup_paths" is given, the path to backup each volume is found in
3718  * this file.
3719  * - All information volumes are backed up on the same location where the log files are located.
3720  * backup_level(in): backup levels allowed: 0 - Full (default),
3721  * 1 - Incremental1, 2 - Incremental
3722  * deleted_unneeded_logarchives(in): Whether to remove log archives that are not needed any longer to recovery from
3723  * crashes when the backup just created is used.
3724  * backup_verbose_file(in): verbose mode file path
3725  * num_threads: number of threads
3726  * zip_method: compression method
3727  * zip_level: compression level
3728  * sleep_msecs(in):
3729  *
3730  * Note: A fuzzy backup of the database is taken. The backup is written into the given backup_path location.
3731  * If the backup_path location is omitted (i.e, NULL is given), the log path location which was specified at
3732  * database creation is used to store the backup.
3733  */
3734 int
3735 xboot_backup (THREAD_ENTRY * thread_p, const char *backup_path, FILEIO_BACKUP_LEVEL backup_level,
3736  bool delete_unneeded_logarchives, const char *backup_verbose_file, int num_threads,
3737  FILEIO_ZIP_METHOD zip_method, FILEIO_ZIP_LEVEL zip_level, int skip_activelog, int sleep_msecs)
3738 {
3739  int error_code;
3740 
3741  error_code =
3742  logpb_backup (thread_p, boot_Db_parm->nvols, backup_path, backup_level, delete_unneeded_logarchives,
3743  backup_verbose_file, num_threads, zip_method, zip_level, skip_activelog, sleep_msecs);
3744  return error_code;
3745 }

3747 /*
3748  * xboot_copy () - copy the database to a new destination
3749  *
3750  * return : NO_ERROR if all OK, ER_ status otherwise
3751  *
3752  * thread_p (in/out) : input thread entry; outputs NULL if thread is finalized (SA_MODE)
3753  * fromdb_name(in): The database from where the copy is made.
3754  * newdb_name(in): Name of new database
3755  * newdb_path(in): Directory where the new database will reside
3756  * newlog_path(in): Directory where the log volumes of the new database will reside
3757  * newlob_path(in): Directory where the lob volumes of the new database will reside
3758  * newdb_server_host(in): Server host where the new database reside
3759  * new_volext_path(in): A path is included if all volumes are placed in one place/directory. If NULL is given,
3760  * - If file "fileof_vols_and_wherepaths" is given, the path is found in this file.
3761  * - Each volume is copied to same place where the volume resides.
3762  * Note: This parameter should be NULL, if the above file is given.
3763  * fileof_vols_and_wherepaths(in): A file is given when the user decides to control the copy/rename of the volume by
3764  * individual bases. That is, user decides to spread the volumes over several locations
3765  * and or to label the volumes with specific names.
3766  * Each volume entry consists of: volid from_fullvolname to_fullvolname
3767  * newdb_overwrite(in): Whether to overwrite the new database if it already exist.
3768  */
3769 int
3770 xboot_copy (REFPTR (THREAD_ENTRY, thread_p), const char *from_dbname, const char *new_db_name, const char *new_db_path,
3771  const char *new_log_path, const char *new_lob_path, const char *new_db_server_host,
3772  const char *new_volext_path, const char *fileof_vols_and_copypaths, bool new_db_overwrite)
3773 {

3775  DB_INFO *db = NULL;

3779  char new_db_pathbuf2[PATH_MAX];
3780  char new_log_pathbuf[PATH_MAX];
3781  char new_lob_pathbuf2[PATH_MAX];
3782  char new_lob_pathbuf[PATH_MAX];
3783  char new_volext_pathbuf[PATH_MAX];
3784  char fixed_pathbuf[PATH_MAX];
3785  char new_db_server_host_buf[MAXHOSTNAMELEN + 1];
3786  char dbtxt_label[PATH_MAX];
3787  int dbtxt_vdes = NULL_VOLDES;
3788  int error_code = NO_ERROR;
3789 #if defined (WINDOWS)
3790  struct stat stat_buf;
3791 #endif
3792 
3793  assert (thread_p != NULL);
3794 
3795  /* If db_path and/or log_path are NULL find the defaults */
3796 
3797  if (new_db_path == NULL || fileof_vols_and_copypaths != NULL)
3798  {
3799  /*
3800  * If a newdb path was given, it is ignored since only one option must
3801  * be specified
3802  */
3803  new_db_path = boot_find_new_db_path (new_db_pathbuf, fileof_vols_and_copypaths);
3804  if (new_db_path == NULL)
3805  {
3806  error_code = ER_FAILED;
3807  goto error;
3808  }
3809  }
3810 
3811  /*
3812  * Make sure that the db_path and log_path are the canonicalized absolute
3813  * pathnames
3814  */
3815 
3816  if (new_db_path == NULL)
3817  {
3818  new_db_path = "";
3819  }
3820  else if (realpath ((char *) new_db_path, new_db_pathbuf2) != NULL)
3821  {
3822  new_db_path = new_db_pathbuf2;
3823  }
3824 
3825  if (new_log_path != NULL && realpath ((char *) new_log_path, new_log_pathbuf) != NULL)
3826  {
3827  new_log_path = new_log_pathbuf;
3828  }
3829 
3830  if (new_log_path == NULL)
3831  {
3832  /* Assign the data volume directory */
3833  strcpy (new_log_pathbuf, new_db_path);
3834  new_log_path = new_log_pathbuf;
3835  }
3836 
3837  if (new_lob_path == NULL)
3838  {
3839  assert_release (new_db_path != NULL);
3840  snprintf (new_lob_pathbuf2, sizeof (new_lob_pathbuf2), "%s%s/lob", LOB_PATH_DEFAULT_PREFIX, new_db_path);
3841  new_lob_path = new_lob_pathbuf2;
3842  }
3843 
3844  if (new_lob_path != NULL)
3845  {
3846  ES_TYPE es_type = es_get_type (new_lob_path);
3847  char *p = NULL;
3848 
3849  switch (es_type)
3850  {
3851  case ES_NONE:
3852  /* prepend default prefix */
3853  snprintf (new_lob_pathbuf, sizeof (new_lob_pathbuf), "%s%s", LOB_PATH_DEFAULT_PREFIX, new_lob_path);
3854  new_lob_path = new_lob_pathbuf;
3855  es_type = ES_POSIX;
3856  p = (char *) strchr (new_lob_path, ':') + 1;
3857  break;
3858  case ES_POSIX:
3859  p = strchr (strcpy (new_lob_pathbuf, new_lob_path), ':') + 1;
3860  break;
3861  case ES_OWFS:
3862 #if !defined (CUBRID_OWFS)
3863  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, ER_ES_INVALID_PATH, 1, new_lob_path);
3864  error_code = ER_ES_INVALID_PATH;
3865  goto error;
3866 #endif /* !CUBRID_OWFS */
3867  case ES_LOCAL:
3868  default:
3869  break;
3870  }
3871 
3872  if (es_type == ES_POSIX && p != NULL)
3873  {
3874 #if defined (WINDOWS)
3875  if (realpath (p, fixed_pathbuf) != NULL
3876  && (stat (fixed_pathbuf, &stat_buf) == 0 && S_ISDIR (stat_buf.st_mode)))
3877 #else
3878  if (realpath (p, fixed_pathbuf) != NULL)
3879 #endif
3880  {
3881  strcpy (p, fixed_pathbuf);
3882  }
3883  else
3884  {
3885  er_set (ER_WARNING_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, ER_BO_DIRECTORY_DOESNOT_EXIST, 1, p);
3886  if (mkdir (p, 0777) < 0)
3887  {
3888  cub_dirname_r (p, fixed_pathbuf, PATH_MAX);
3889  er_set_with_oserror (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, ER_ES_GENERAL, 2, "POSIX", fixed_pathbuf);
3890  error_code = ER_BO_DIRECTORY_DOESNOT_EXIST;
3891  goto error;
3892  }
3893  }
3894  }
3895  }
3896 
3897  if (new_volext_path != NULL && realpath ((char *) new_volext_path, new_volext_pathbuf) != NULL)
3898  {
3899  new_volext_path = new_volext_pathbuf;
3900  }
3901 
3902  /* If a host was not given, assume the current host */
3903 
3904  if (new_db_server_host == NULL)
3905  {
3906 #if 0 /* use Unix-domain socket for localhost */
3907  if (GETHOSTNAME (new_db_server_host_buf, MAXHOSTNAMELEN) != 0)
3908  {
3909  er_set_with_oserror (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, ER_BO_UNABLE_TO_FIND_HOSTNAME, 0);
3910  error_code = ER_BO_UNABLE_TO_FIND_HOSTNAME;
3911  goto error;
3912  }
3913 #else
3914  strcpy (new_db_server_host_buf, "localhost");
3915 #endif
3916  new_db_server_host = new_db_server_host_buf;
3917  }
3918 
3919  /* Make sure that the full path for the new database is not too long */
3920  if ((int) (strlen (new_db_name) + strlen (new_db_path) + 2) > DB_MAX_PATH_LENGTH)
3921  {
3922  /*
3923  * db_path + db_name is too long
3924  */
3925  er_set (ER_FATAL_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, ER_BO_FULL_DATABASE_NAME_IS_TOO_LONG, 3, new_db_path, new_db_name,
3926  strlen (new_db_name) + strlen (new_db_path) + 2, DB_MAX_PATH_LENGTH);
3927  error_code = ER_BO_FULL_DATABASE_NAME_IS_TOO_LONG;
3928  goto error;
3929  }
3930 
3931  /* Get the log prefix */
3932  new_log_prefix = fileio_get_base_file_name (new_db_name);
3933 
3934  /*
3935  * get the database directory information in write mode
3936  */
3937  if (cfg_maycreate_get_directory_filename (dbtxt_label) == NULL
3938 #if !defined(WINDOWS) || !defined(DONT_USE_MANDATORY_LOCK_IN_WINDOWS)
3939 /* Temporary fix for NT file locking problem */
3940  || (dbtxt_vdes = fileio_mount (thread_p, dbtxt_label, dbtxt_label, LOG_DBTXT_VOLID, 2, true)) == NULL_VOLDES
3941 #endif /* !WINDOWS || !DONT_USE_MANDATORY_LOCK_IN_WINDOWS */
3942  )
3943  {
3944  error_code = ER_FAILED;
3945  goto error;
3946  }
3947 
3948  if (dbtxt_vdes != NULL_VOLDES)
3949  {
3950  error_code = cfg_read_directory_ex (dbtxt_vdes, &dir, true);
3951  if (error_code != NO_ERROR)
3952  {
3953  goto error;
3954  }
3955  }
3956  else
3957  {
3958  error_code = cfg_read_directory (&dir, true);
3959  if (error_code != NO_ERROR)
3960  {
3961  goto error;
3962  }
3963  }
3964 
3965  if (dir != NULL && ((db = cfg_find_db_list (dir, new_db_name)) != NULL))
3966  {
3967  if (new_db_overwrite == false)
3968  {
3969  /* There is a database with the same name and we cannot overwrite it */
3970  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, ER_BO_DATABASE_EXISTS, 1, new_db_name);
3971  {
3972  error_code = ER_BO_DATABASE_EXISTS;
3973  goto error;
3974  }
3975  }
3976  else
3977  {
3978  /*
3979  * Delete the database.. to make sure that all backups, log archives, and
3980  * so on are removed... then continue...
3981  * Note: we do not call xboot_delete since it reverts a bunch of stuff.
3982  */
3983  CHECK_ARGS check_col_and_timezone = { true, true };
3984  cfg_free_directory (dir);
3985  dir = NULL;
3986 
3987  if (dbtxt_vdes != NULL_VOLDES)
3988  {
3989  fileio_dismount (thread_p, dbtxt_vdes);
3990  dbtxt_vdes = NULL_VOLDES;
3991  }
3992  (void) xboot_shutdown_server (thread_p, ER_THREAD_FINAL);
3993 
3994  error_code = xboot_delete (new_db_name, true, BOOT_SHUTDOWN_EXCEPT_COMMON_MODULES);
3995  if (error_code != NO_ERROR)
3996  {
3997  goto error;
3998  }
3999  check_col_and_timezone.check_db_coll = false;
4000  error_code = boot_restart_server (thread_p, false, from_dbname, false, &check_col_and_timezone, NULL);
4001  if (error_code != NO_ERROR)
4002  {
4003  goto error;
4004  }
4005 
4006  // get current thread entry
4007  thread_p = thread_get_thread_entry_info ();
4008  error_code =
4009  xboot_copy (thread_p, from_dbname, new_db_name, new_db_path, new_log_path, new_lob_path, new_db_server_host,
4010  new_volext_path, fileof_vols_and_copypaths, false);
4011  assert (thread_p == NULL);
4012 
4013  return error_code;
4014  }
4015  }
4016 
4017  if (dbtxt_vdes != NULL_VOLDES)
4018  {
4019  fileio_dismount (thread_p, dbtxt_vdes); /* unlock the directory file */
4020  dbtxt_vdes = NULL_VOLDES;
4021  cfg_free_directory (dir);
4022  dir = NULL;
4023  }
4024 
4025  /*
4026  * Compose the full name of the new database
4027  */
4028 
4029  COMPOSE_FULL_NAME (new_db_fullname, sizeof (new_db_fullname), new_db_path, new_db_name);
4030 
4031  /*
4032  * Copy the database
4033  */
4034 
4035  error_code =
4036  logpb_copy_database (thread_p, boot_Db_parm->nvols, new_db_fullname, new_log_path, new_log_prefix, new_volext_path,
4037  fileof_vols_and_copypaths);
4038  if (error_code != NO_ERROR)
4039  {
4040  (void) xtran_server_abort (NULL);
4041  }
4042  else
4043  {
4044  /* Now create the entry in the database table */
4045 
4046  if (xtran_server_commit (thread_p, false) != TRAN_UNACTIVE_COMMITTED)
4047  {
4048  error_code = ER_FAILED;
4049  goto error;
4050  }
4051 
4052 #if !defined(WINDOWS) || !defined(DONT_USE_MANDATORY_LOCK_IN_WINDOWS)
4053  dbtxt_vdes = fileio_mount (thread_p, dbtxt_label, dbtxt_label, LOG_DBTXT_VOLID, 2, true);
4054  if (dbtxt_vdes == NULL_VOLDES)
4055  {
4056  error_code = ER_FAILED;
4057  goto error;
4058  }
4059 #endif /* !WINDOWS || !DONT_USE_MANDATORY_LOCK_IN_WINDOWS */
4060 
4061  if (dbtxt_vdes != NULL_VOLDES)
4062  {
4063  error_code = cfg_read_directory_ex (dbtxt_vdes, &dir, true);
4064  if (error_code != NO_ERROR)
4065  {
4066  goto error;
4067  }
4068  }
4069  else
4070  {
4071  error_code = cfg_read_directory (&dir, true);
4072  if (error_code != NO_ERROR)
4073  {
4074  goto error;
4075  }
4076  }
4077  db = cfg_find_db_list (dir, new_db_name);
4078 
4079  if (db == NULL)
4080  {
4081  db = cfg_add_db (&dir, new_db_name, new_db_path, new_log_path, new_lob_path, new_db_server_host);
4082  }
4083  else
4084  {
4085  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, ER_BO_DATABASE_EXISTS, 1, new_db_name);
4086  error_code = ER_BO_DATABASE_EXISTS;
4087  goto error;
4088  }
4089 
4090  if (dbtxt_vdes != NULL_VOLDES)
4091  {
4092  cfg_write_directory_ex (dbtxt_vdes, dir);
4093  }
4094  else
4095  {
4096  cfg_write_directory (dir);
4097  }
4098 
4099 #if defined(WINDOWS) && !defined(DONT_USE_MANDATORY_LOCK_IN_WINDOWS)
4100  if (dbtxt_vdes != NULL_VOLDES)
4101  {
4102  fileio_dismount (thread_p, dbtxt_vdes);
4103  dbtxt_vdes = NULL_VOLDES;
4104  }
4105 #endif /* WINDOWS && !DONT_USE_MANDATORY_LOCK_IN_WINDOWS */
4106  }
4107 
4108  cfg_free_directory (dir);
4109  if (dbtxt_vdes != NULL_VOLDES)
4110  {
4111  fileio_dismount (thread_p, dbtxt_vdes);
4112  }
4113 
4114  (void) xboot_shutdown_server (thread_p, ER_THREAD_FINAL);
4115  return error_code;
4116 
4117 error:
4118  if (dir != NULL)
4119  {
4120  cfg_free_directory (dir);
4121  }
4122 
4123  if (dbtxt_vdes != NULL_VOLDES)
4124  {
4125  fileio_dismount (thread_p, dbtxt_vdes);
4126  }
4127 
4128  (void) xboot_shutdown_server (thread_p, ER_THREAD_FINAL);
4129 
4130  return error_code;
4131 }

4133 /*
4134  * xboot_soft_rename () - a soft rename of a database on the same disk partitions
4135  *
4136  * return : NO_ERROR if all OK, ER_ status otherwise
4137  *
4138  * olddb_name(in): Name of new database
4139  * newdb_name(in): Directory where the new database will reside
4140  * newdb_path(in): Directory where the log volumes of the new database
4141  * will reside
4142  * newlog_path(in): Server host where the new database reside
4143  * newdb_server_host(in): Wheater to overwrite the new database if it already
4144  * exist.
4145  * new_volext_path(in): A path is included if all volumes are placed in one
4146  * place/directory. If NULL is given,
4147  * - If file "fileof_vols_and_wherepaths" is given, the
4148  * path is found in this file.
4149  * - Each volume is copied to same place where the
4150  * volume resides.
4151  * Note: This parameter should be NULL, if the above file
4152  * is given.
4153  * fileof_vols_and_renamepaths(in):A file is given when the user decides to
4154  * control the rename of the volume by
4155  * individual bases. That is, user decides to
4156  * spread the volumes over several locations and
4157  * or to label the volumes with specific names.
4158  * Each volume entry consists of:
4159  * volid from_fullvolname to_fullvolname
4160  * newdb_overwrite(in):Rename the volumes/files at OS too. If it is true,
4161  * the enw database cannot exist in database.txt
4162  * extern_rename(in): Rename the volumes/files at OS too. If it is true,
4163  * the enw database cannot exist in database.txt
4164  * force_delete(in): Force delete backup volumes and information file
4165  *

4167 int

4321  }
4322 
4323  if (dir != NULL && (db = cfg_find_db_list (dir, new_db_name)) == NULL && extern_rename != true)
4324  {
4325  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, ER_BO_UNKNOWN_DATABASE, 1, new_db_name);
4326  error_code = ER_BO_UNKNOWN_DATABASE;
4327  goto end;
4328  }
4329 
4330  if (dir != NULL && db != NULL && extern_rename == true && new_db_overwrite == false)
4331  {
4332  /* There is a database with the same name and we cannot overwrite it */
4333  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, ER_BO_DATABASE_EXISTS, 1, new_db_name);
4334  error_code = ER_BO_DATABASE_EXISTS;
4335  goto end;
4336  }
4337 
4338  /*
4339  * Compose the full name of the new database
4340  */
4341 
4342  COMPOSE_FULL_NAME (new_db_fullname, sizeof (new_db_fullname), new_db_path, new_db_name);
4343 
4344  /*
4345  * Rename the database
4346  */
4347 
4348  error_code =
4349  logpb_rename_all_volumes_files (thread_p, boot_Db_parm->nvols, new_db_fullname, new_log_path, newlog_prefix,
4350  new_volext_path, fileof_vols_and_renamepaths, extern_rename, force_delete);
4351  if (error_code != NO_ERROR)
4352  {
4353  goto end;
4354  }
4355 
4356  /* Now create the entry in the database table */
4357  if (extern_rename == true)
4358  {
4359  if (db == NULL)
4360  {
4361  const char *old_lob_path = NULL;
4362  char new_lob_pathbuf[PATH_MAX] = { '\0' };
4363  char *new_lob_path = NULL;
4364 
4365  old_lob_path = boot_get_lob_path ();
4366  if (*old_lob_path != '\0')
4367  {
4368  new_lob_path = strncpy (new_lob_pathbuf, old_lob_path, PATH_MAX);
4369  }
4370 
4371  cfg_delete_db (&dir, old_db_name);
4372  db = cfg_add_db (&dir, new_db_name, new_db_path, new_log_path, new_lob_path, new_db_server_host);
4373  }
4374  else
4375  {
4376  cfg_update_db (db, new_db_path, new_log_path, NULL, new_db_server_host);
4377  }
4378 
4379  if (db == NULL || db->name == NULL || db->pathname == NULL || db->logpath == NULL || db->hosts == NULL)
4380  {
4381  error_code = ER_FAILED;
4382  goto end;
4383  }
4384  }
4385 #if defined(WINDOWS) && !defined(DONT_USE_MANDATORY_LOCK_IN_WINDOWS)
4386  /* must unlock this before we can open it again for writing */
4387  if (dbtxt_vdes != NULL_VOLDES)
4388  {
4389  fileio_dismount (thread_p, dbtxt_vdes);
4390  dbtxt_vdes = NULL_VOLDES;
4391  }
4392 #endif /* WINDOWS && !DONT_USE_MANDATORY_LOCK_IN_WINDOWS */
4393  if (dbtxt_vdes != NULL_VOLDES)
4394  {
4395  cfg_write_directory_ex (dbtxt_vdes, dir);
4396  }
4397  else
4398  {
4399  cfg_write_directory (dir);
4400  }
4401 
4402 end:
4403  if (dir != NULL)
4404  {
4405  cfg_free_directory (dir);
4406  }
4407 
4408  if (dbtxt_vdes != NULL_VOLDES)
4409  {
4410  fileio_dismount (thread_p, dbtxt_vdes);
4411  }
4412 
4413  return error_code;
4414 }
4415 
4416 /*
4417  * xboot_delete () - delete all log files and database backups
4418  *
4419  * return: NO_ERROR if all OK, ER_ status otherwise
4420  *
4421  * db_name(in):
4422  * force_delete(in):
4423  *
4424  * Note: All data, log, and backup files associated with the current
4425  * database are removed from the system.
4426  * This is a very dangerous operation since the database cannot
4427  * be recovered after this operation is executed. We strongly
4428  * recommend that you backup the database and put the backup on
4429  * tape or outside the log and backup directories before this
4430  * operation is done. After this operation is executed the system
4431  * is unavailable, that is, the system is shutdown by this
4432  * operation.
4433  *
4434  * Note: This function must be run offline, that is, it should not be
4435  * run when there are multiusers in the system.
4436  */
4437 int
4438 xboot_delete (const char *db_name, bool force_delete, BOOT_SERVER_SHUTDOWN_MODE shutdown_common_modules)
4439 {
4440  char log_path[PATH_MAX];
4441  const char *log_prefix = NULL;
4442  DB_INFO *db;
4443  DB_INFO *dir = NULL;
4444  int dbtxt_vdes = NULL_VOLDES;
4445  char dbtxt_label[PATH_MAX];
4446  int error_code = NO_ERROR;
4447  THREAD_ENTRY *thread_p = NULL;
4448 
4449  if (!BO_IS_SERVER_RESTARTED ())
4450  {
4451  /*
4452  * Compose the full name of the database and find location of logs
4453  */
4454  if (msgcat_init () != NO_ERROR)
4455  {
4456  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, ER_BO_CANNOT_ACCESS_MESSAGE_CATALOG, 0);
4457  return ER_FAILED;
4458  }
4459 
4460  if (sysprm_load_and_init (NULL, NULL, SYSPRM_LOAD_ALL) != NO_ERROR)
4461  {
4462  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, ER_BO_CANT_LOAD_SYSPRM, 0);
4463  return ER_FAILED;
4464  }
4465 
4466  er_clear ();
4467  }
4468 
4469  /* *INDENT-OFF* */
4470  cubthread::initialize (thread_p);
4471  error_code = cubthread::initialize_thread_entries ();
4472  if (error_code != NO_ERROR)
4473  {
4474  ASSERT_ERROR ();
4475  return error_code;
4476  }
4477  /* *INDENT-ON* */
4478 
4479  error_code = perfmon_initialize (1); /* 1 transaction for SA_MDOE */
4480  if (error_code != NO_ERROR)
4481  {
4482  ASSERT_ERROR ();
4483  return error_code;
4484  }
4485 
4486  /* Find the prefix for the database */
4487  log_prefix = fileio_get_base_file_name (db_name);
4488 
4489  /*
4490  * get the database directory information in write mode.
4491  */
4492  if (cfg_maycreate_get_directory_filename (dbtxt_label) == NULL)
4493  {
4494  goto error_dirty_delete;
4495  }
4496 
4497 #if !defined(WINDOWS) || !defined(DONT_USE_MANDATORY_LOCK_IN_WINDOWS)
4498  /* Temporary solution to NT file locking problem */
4499  dbtxt_vdes = fileio_mount (thread_p, dbtxt_label, dbtxt_label, LOG_DBTXT_VOLID, 2, true);
4500  if (dbtxt_vdes == NULL_VOLDES)
4501  {
4502  return ER_FAILED;
4503  }
4504 #endif /* !WINDOWS || !DONT_USE_MANDATORY_LOCK_IN_WINDOWS */
4505 
4506  if (dbtxt_vdes != NULL_VOLDES)
4507  {
4508  error_code = cfg_read_directory_ex (dbtxt_vdes, &dir, true);
4509  }
4510  else
4511  {
4512  error_code = cfg_read_directory (&dir, true);
4513  }
4514 
4515  if (error_code != NO_ERROR)
4516  {
4517  /*
4518  * If I cannot obtain a Lock on database.txt, it is better to quite at
4519  * this moment. We will not even perform a dirty delete.
4520  */
4521  if (dbtxt_vdes != NULL_VOLDES)
4522  {
4523  fileio_dismount (thread_p, dbtxt_vdes);
4524  }
4525  return error_code;
4526  }
4527 
4528  if (dir == NULL || (db = cfg_find_db_list (dir, db_name)) == NULL)
4529  {
4530  if (dbtxt_vdes != NULL_VOLDES)
4531  {
4532  fileio_dismount (thread_p, dbtxt_vdes);
4533  }
4534  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, ER_BO_UNKNOWN_DATABASE, 1, db_name);
4535  if (dir)
4536  {
4537  cfg_free_directory (dir);
4538  }
4539  goto error_dirty_delete;
4540  }
4541 
4542  /*
4543  * How can we perform the delete operation..without restarting the system
4544  * or restarted the system.
4545  */
4546 
4547  if (!BO_IS_SERVER_RESTARTED ())
4548  {
4549  /*
4550  * Compose the full name of the database and find location of logs
4551  */
4552  COMPOSE_FULL_NAME (boot_Db_full_name, sizeof (boot_Db_full_name), db->pathname, db_name);
4553  }
4554 
4555  if (boot_volume_info_log_path (log_path) == NULL)
4556  {
4557  strcpy (log_path, db->logpath);
4558  }
4559 
4560  if (dbtxt_vdes != NULL_VOLDES)
4561  {
4562  fileio_dismount (thread_p, dbtxt_vdes);
4563  dbtxt_vdes = NULL_VOLDES;
4564  cfg_free_directory (dir);
4565  dir = NULL;
4566  }
4567 
4568  /* Now delete the database. Normally, DWB was already removed at database shutdown. */
4569  error_code = boot_remove_all_volumes (thread_p, boot_Db_full_name, log_path, log_prefix, false, force_delete);
4570  if (error_code == NO_ERROR)
4571  {
4572 #if defined(WINDOWS) && !defined(DONT_USE_MANDATORY_LOCK_IN_WINDOWS)
4573  dbtxt_vdes = fileio_mount (thread_p, dbtxt_label, dbtxt_label, LOG_DBTXT_VOLID, 2, true);
4574  if (dbtxt_vdes == NULL_VOLDES)
4575  {
4576  goto error_dirty_delete;
4577  }
4578 #endif /* WINDOWS && !DONT_USE_MANDATORY_LOCK_IN_WINDOWS */
4579 
4580  if (dbtxt_vdes != NULL_VOLDES)
4581  {
4582  if (cfg_read_directory_ex (dbtxt_vdes, &dir, true) != NO_ERROR)
4583  {
4584  goto error_dirty_delete;
4585  }
4586  }
4587  else
4588  {
4589  if (cfg_read_directory (&dir, true) != NO_ERROR)
4590  {
4591  goto error_dirty_delete;
4592  }
4593  }
4594 
4595  db = cfg_find_db_list (dir, db_name);
4596 
4597  if (db && cfg_delete_db (&dir, db_name))
4598  {
4599 #if defined(WINDOWS) && !defined(DONT_USE_MANDATORY_LOCK_IN_WINDOWS)
4600  /* must unlock it before opening it for write again */
4601  if (dbtxt_vdes != NULL_VOLDES)
4602  {
4603  fileio_dismount (thread_p, dbtxt_vdes);
4604  dbtxt_vdes = NULL_VOLDES;
4605  }
4606 #endif /* WINDOWS && !DONT_USE_MANDATORY_LOCK_IN_WINDOWS */
4607  if (dbtxt_vdes != NULL_VOLDES)
4608  {
4609  cfg_write_directory_ex (dbtxt_vdes, dir);
4610  }
4611  else
4612  {
4613  cfg_write_directory (dir);
4614  }
4615  }
4616  cfg_free_directory (dir);
4617  }
4618 
4619  if (dbtxt_vdes != NULL_VOLDES)
4620  {
4621  fileio_dismount (thread_p, dbtxt_vdes);
4622  }
4623 
4624  /* Shutdown the server */
4625  if (error_code == NO_ERROR)
4626  {
4627  boot_server_all_finalize (thread_p, ER_THREAD_FINAL, shutdown_common_modules);
4628  }
4629  else
4630  {
4631  er_stack_push ();
4632 #if defined (SERVER_MODE)
4633  boot_server_all_finalize (thread_p, ER_THREAD_FINAL, BOOT_SHUTDOWN_ALL_MODULES);
4634 #else
4635  boot_server_all_finalize (thread_p, ER_THREAD_FINAL, shutdown_common_modules);
4636 #endif
4637  er_stack_pop ();
4638  }
4639 
4640 #if defined (SA_MODE)
4641  cubthread::finalize ();
4642  thread_p = NULL;
4643 #endif // SA_MODE
4644 
4645  return error_code;
4646 
4647 error_dirty_delete:
4648 
4649  error_code = ER_FAILED;
4650 
4651  /* Shutdown the server */
4652  er_stack_push ();
4653 #if defined (SERVER_MODE)
4654  boot_server_all_finalize (thread_p, ER_THREAD_FINAL, BOOT_SHUTDOWN_ALL_MODULES);
4655 #else
4656  boot_server_all_finalize (thread_p, ER_THREAD_FINAL, shutdown_common_modules);
4657 #endif
4658  er_stack_pop ();
4659 
4660 #if defined (SA_MODE)
4661  cubthread::finalize ();
4662  thread_p = NULL;
4663 #endif // SA_MODE
4664 
4665  return error_code;
4666 }
4667 
4668 /*
4669  * boot_create_all_volumes () -
4670  *
4671  * return:
4672  *
4673  * db_comments(in):
4674  * db_npages(in):
4675  * file_addmore_vols(in):
4676  * log_path(in):
4677  * log_prefix(in):
4678  * log_npages(in):
4679  * client_prog_name(in):
4680  * client_user_name(in):
4681  * client_host_name(in):
4682  * client_process_id(in):
4683  * client_lock_wait(in):
4684  * client_isolation(in):
4685  */
4686 static int
4687 boot_create_all_volumes (THREAD_ENTRY * thread_p, const BOOT_CLIENT_CREDENTIAL * client_credential,
4688  const char *db_comments, DKNPAGES db_npages, const char *file_addmore_vols,
4689  const char *log_path, const char *log_prefix, DKNPAGES log_npages,
4690  int client_lock_wait, TRAN_ISOLATION client_isolation)
4691 {
4692  int tran_index = NULL_TRAN_INDEX;
4693  VOLID db_volid = NULL_VOLID;
4694  RECDES recdes;
4695  int error_code;
4696  DBDEF_VOL_EXT_INFO ext_info;
4697  HEAP_OPERATION_CONTEXT heapop_context;
4698 
4699  assert (client_credential != NULL);
4700 
4701  error_code = spage_boot (thread_p);
4702  if (error_code != NO_ERROR)
4703  {
4704  goto error;
4705  }
4706  error_code = heap_manager_initialize ();
4707  if (error_code != NO_ERROR)
4708  {
4709  goto error;
4710  }
4711 
4712  /* Create the active log and initialize the log and recovery manager */
4713  error_code = log_create (thread_p, boot_Db_full_name, log_path, log_prefix, log_npages);
4714  if (error_code != NO_ERROR || boot_Init_server_is_canceled)
4715  {
4716  goto error;
4717  }
4718  log_initialize (thread_p, boot_Db_full_name, log_path, log_prefix, false, NULL);
4719 
4720  /* Assign an index to current thread of execution (i.e., a client id) */
4721 
4722  tran_index =
4723  logtb_assign_tran_index (thread_p, NULL_TRANID, TRAN_ACTIVE, client_credential, NULL, client_lock_wait,
4724  client_isolation);
4725  if (tran_index == NULL_TRAN_INDEX)
4726  {
4727  goto error;
4728  }
4729 
4730  ext_info.name = boot_Db_full_name;
4731  ext_info.comments = db_comments;
4732  ext_info.max_npages = db_npages;
4733  ext_info.max_writesize_in_sec = 0;
4734  ext_info.purpose = DB_PERMANENT_DATA_PURPOSE;
4735  ext_info.extend_npages = db_npages;
4736 
4737  /* Create double write buffer if not already created. DWB creation must be done before first volume.
4738  * DWB file is created on log_path.
4739  */
4740  if (dwb_create (thread_p, log_path, log_prefix) != NO_ERROR)
4741  {
4742  goto error;
4743  }
4744 
4745  /* Format the first database volume */
4746  error_code = disk_format_first_volume (thread_p, boot_Db_full_name, db_comments, db_npages);
4747  if (error_code != NO_ERROR)
4748  {
4749  ASSERT_ERROR ();
4750  goto error;
4751  }
4752 
4753  if (logpb_add_volume (NULL, LOG_DBFIRST_VOLID, boot_Db_full_name, DB_PERMANENT_DATA_PURPOSE) != LOG_DBFIRST_VOLID)
4754  {
4755  goto error;
4756  }
4757 
4758  /*
4759  * Initialize the database parameter table
4760  */
4761 
4762  boot_Db_parm->trk_vfid.volid = LOG_DBFIRST_VOLID;
4763  boot_Db_parm->hfid.vfid.volid = LOG_DBFIRST_VOLID;
4764  boot_Db_parm->rootclass_hfid.vfid.volid = LOG_DBFIRST_VOLID;
4765 #if 1 /* TODO */
4766  boot_Db_parm->classname_table.vfid.volid = LOG_DBFIRST_VOLID;
4767 #endif
4768  boot_Db_parm->ctid.vfid.volid = LOG_DBFIRST_VOLID;
4769 #if 1 /* TODO */
4770  boot_Db_parm->ctid.xhid.vfid.volid = LOG_DBFIRST_VOLID;
4771 #endif
4772 
4773  (void) strncpy (boot_Db_parm->rootclass_name, ROOTCLASS_NAME, DB_SIZEOF (boot_Db_parm->rootclass_name));
4774  boot_Db_parm->nvols = 1;
4775  boot_Db_parm->last_volid = LOG_DBFIRST_VOLID;
4776  boot_Db_parm->temp_nvols = 0;
4777  boot_Db_parm->temp_last_volid = NULL_VOLID;
4778 
4779  /* The query area has been removed */
4780  boot_Db_parm->query_vfid.volid = NULL_VOLID;
4781  boot_Db_parm->query_vfid.fileid = NULL_FILEID;
4782 
4783  OID_SET_NULL (&boot_Db_parm->rootclass_oid);
4784  oid_set_root (&boot_Db_parm->rootclass_oid);
4785 
4786  /* Get parameter value for vacuum data file size. Save it to boot_Db_parm to keep the value persistent even if the
4787  * server is restarted and the value in config file is changed. */
4788  boot_Db_parm->vacuum_log_block_npages = prm_get_integer_value (PRM_ID_VACUUM_LOG_BLOCK_PAGES);
4789  VFID_SET_NULL (&boot_Db_parm->vacuum_data_vfid);
4790  VFID_SET_NULL (&boot_Db_parm->dropped_files_vfid);
4791 
4792  /* Create the needed files */
4793  error_code = file_tracker_create (thread_p, &boot_Db_parm->trk_vfid);
4794  if (error_code != NO_ERROR)
4795  {
4796  ASSERT_ERROR ();
4797  goto error;
4798  }
4799  error_code = xheap_create (thread_p, &boot_Db_parm->hfid, NULL, false);
4800  if (error_code != NO_ERROR)
4801  {
4802  ASSERT_ERROR ();
4803  goto error;
4804  }
4805  error_code = xheap_create (thread_p, &boot_Db_parm->rootclass_hfid, NULL, false);
4806  if (error_code != NO_ERROR)
4807  {
4808  ASSERT_ERROR ();
4809  goto error;
4810  }
4811  error_code = heap_assign_address (thread_p, &boot_Db_parm->rootclass_hfid, NULL, &boot_Db_parm->rootclass_oid, 0);
4812  if (error_code != NO_ERROR)
4813  {
4814  ASSERT_ERROR ();
4815  goto error;
4816  }
4817 
4818  oid_set_root (&boot_Db_parm->rootclass_oid);
4819  /* we need to manually add root class HFID to cache */
4820  error_code =
4821  heap_insert_hfid_for_class_oid (thread_p, &boot_Db_parm->rootclass_oid, &boot_Db_parm->rootclass_hfid, FILE_HEAP);
4822  if (error_code != NO_ERROR)
4823  {
4824  assert_release (false);
4825  goto error;
4826  }
4827 
4828 #if 1 /* TODO */
4829  if (xehash_create (thread_p, &boot_Db_parm->classname_table, DB_TYPE_STRING, -1, &boot_Db_parm->rootclass_oid, -1,
4830  false) == NULL)
4831  {
4832  goto error;
4833  }
4834 #endif
4835 
4836  /* Initialize structures for global unique statistics */
4837  error_code = logtb_initialize_global_unique_stats_table (thread_p);
4838  if (error_code != NO_ERROR)
4839  {
4840  goto error;
4841  }
4842 
4843  if (catalog_create (thread_p, &boot_Db_parm->ctid) == NULL)
4844  {
4845  goto error;
4846  }
4847 
4848  error_code = disk_set_boot_hfid (thread_p, LOG_DBFIRST_VOLID, &boot_Db_parm->hfid);
4849  if (error_code != NO_ERROR)
4850  {
4851  goto error;
4852  }
4853 
4854  /* Store the parameter table */
4855  recdes.area_size = recdes.length = DB_SIZEOF (*boot_Db_parm);
4856  recdes.type = REC_HOME;
4857  recdes.data = (char *) boot_Db_parm;
4858 
4859  /* Prepare context */
4860  heap_create_insert_context (&heapop_context, &boot_Db_parm->hfid, &boot_Db_parm->rootclass_oid, &recdes, NULL);
4861 
4862  /* Insert and fetch location */
4863  if (heap_insert_logical (thread_p, &heapop_context) != NO_ERROR)
4864  {
4865  goto error;
4866  }
4867  COPY_OID (boot_Db_parm_oid, &heapop_context.res_oid);
4868 
4869  /* Create file for vacuum data */
4870  if (vacuum_create_file_for_vacuum_data (thread_p, &boot_Db_parm->vacuum_data_vfid) != NO_ERROR)
4871  {
4872  goto error;
4873  }
4874 
4875  /* Create file for dropped files (tracked by vacuum) */
4876  if (vacuum_create_file_for_dropped_files (thread_p, &boot_Db_parm->dropped_files_vfid) != NO_ERROR)
4877  {
4878  goto error;
4879  }
4880 
4881  /* Update boot_Db_parm */
4882  error_code = boot_db_parm_update_heap (thread_p);
4883  if (error_code != NO_ERROR)
4884  {
4885  ASSERT_ERROR ();
4886  goto error;
4887  }
4888 
4889  /*
4890  * Create the rest of the other volumes if any
4891  */
4892 
4893  if (file_addmore_vols != NULL)
4894  {
4895  error_code = boot_parse_add_volume_extensions (thread_p, file_addmore_vols);
4896  if (error_code != NO_ERROR)
4897  {
4898  goto error;
4899  }
4900  }
4901 
4902  error_code = locator_initialize (thread_p);
4903  if (error_code != NO_ERROR)
4904  {
4905  goto error;
4906  }
4907 
4908  error_code = pgbuf_flush_all (thread_p, NULL_VOLID);
4909  if (error_code != NO_ERROR)
4910  {
4911  goto error;
4912  }
4913 
4914  /*
4915  * Initialize the catalog manager, the query evaluator, and install meta
4916  * classes
4917  */
4918 
4919  oid_set_root (&boot_Db_parm->rootclass_oid);
4920  catalog_initialize (&boot_Db_parm->ctid);
4921 
4922  if (qmgr_initialize (thread_p) != NO_ERROR)
4923  {
4924  goto error;
4925  }
4926 
4927  error_code = tf_install_meta_classes ();
4928  if (error_code != NO_ERROR)
4929  {
4930  goto error;
4931  }
4932 
4933  logpb_flush_pages_direct (thread_p);
4934  (void) pgbuf_flush_all (thread_p, NULL_VOLID);
4935  (void) fileio_synchronize_all (thread_p, false);
4936 
4937  (void) logpb_checkpoint (thread_p);
4938  boot_server_status (BOOT_SERVER_UP);
4939 
4940  return tran_index;
4941 
4942  /* An error was found */
4943 error:
4944 
4945  if (db_volid != NULL_VOLID)
4946  {
4947  (void) logpb_delete (thread_p, boot_Db_parm->nvols, boot_Db_full_name, log_path, log_prefix, true);
4948  }
4949  else
4950  {
4951  if (tran_index != NULL_TRAN_INDEX)
4952  {
4953  logtb_release_tran_index (thread_p, tran_index);
4954  log_final (thread_p);
4955  }
4956  }
4957 
4958  er_stack_push ();
4959  boot_server_all_finalize (thread_p, ER_THREAD_FINAL, BOOT_SHUTDOWN_EXCEPT_COMMON_MODULES);
4960  er_stack_pop ();
4961 
4962  return NULL_TRAN_INDEX;
4963 }

4965 /*
4966  * boot_remove_all_volumes () - remove all log files, information volumes, and backups
4967  * of given full database name
4968  *
4969  * return: NO_ERROR if all OK, ER_ status otherwise
4970  *
4971  * db_fullname(in):Full name of the database (A path)
4972  * log_path(in): Path of log (cannot be NULL)
4973  * log_prefix(in): Prefix of log (cannot be NULL)
4974  * dirty_rem(in):
4975  * force_delete(in):
4976  *
4977  * Note: All data, log, and backup files associated with the given
4978  * database are removed from the system. However, the database is
4979  * not unregistered from the database.txt. That is, this function
4980  * does not know anything about database.txt.
4981  * See xboot_delete for deletion of database instead of volumes.
4982  */
4983 static int
4984 boot_remove_all_volumes (THREAD_ENTRY * thread_p, const char *db_fullname, const char *log_path, const char *log_prefix,
4985  bool dirty_rem, bool force_delete)
4986 {
4987  int error_code = NO_ERROR;
4988 
4989  if (dirty_rem)
4990  {
4991  goto error_rem_allvols;
4992  }
4993 
4994  /*
4995  * How can we perform the delete operation..without restarting the system
4996  * or restarted the system.
4997  */
4998 
4999  if (!BO_IS_SERVER_RESTARTED ())
5000  {
5001  /* System is not restarted. Read the system parameters */
5002  if (msgcat_init () != NO_ERROR)
5003  {
5004  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, ER_BO_CANNOT_ACCESS_MESSAGE_CATALOG, 0);
5005  return ER_FAILED;
5006  }
5007 
5008  if (sysprm_load_and_init (NULL, NULL, SYSPRM_LOAD_ALL) != NO_ERROR)
5009  {
5010  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, ER_BO_CANT_LOAD_SYSPRM, 0);
5011  return ER_FAILED;
5012  }
5013 
5014  /*
5015  * Initialize error structure, critical section, slotted page, heap, and
5016  * recovery managers
5017  */
5018 
5019  er_clear ();
5020 
5021  /* Initialize the transaction table */
5022  logtb_define_trantable (thread_p, -1, -1);
5023 
5024  /* The database pagesize is set by log_get_io_page_size */
5025 
5026  if (log_get_io_page_size (thread_p, db_fullname, log_path, log_prefix) == -1)
5027  {
5028  /*
5029  * There is something wrong with this database... We will only remove
5030  * as much as we can
5031  */
5032  goto error_rem_allvols;
5033  }
5034  if (!fileio_is_volume_exist (db_fullname))
5035  {
5036  goto error_rem_allvols;
5037  }
5038  if (!logpb_exist_log (thread_p, db_fullname, log_path, log_prefix))
5039  {
5040  goto error_rem_allvols;
5041  }
5042  error_code = boot_mount (thread_p, LOG_DBFIRST_VOLID, db_fullname, NULL);
5043  if (error_code != NO_ERROR)
5044  {
5045  goto error_rem_allvols;
5046  }
5047  if (disk_get_boot_hfid (thread_p, LOG_DBFIRST_VOLID, &boot_Db_parm->hfid) == NULL)
5048  {
5049  goto error_rem_allvols;
5050  }
5051  error_code = boot_get_db_parm (thread_p, boot_Db_parm, boot_Db_parm_oid);
5052  if (error_code != NO_ERROR)
5053  {
5054  goto error_rem_allvols;
5055  }
5056 
5057  /* Find the rest of the volumes and mount them */
5058  error_code = boot_find_rest_volumes (thread_p, NULL, LOG_DBFIRST_VOLID, boot_mount, NULL);
5059  if (error_code != NO_ERROR)
5060  {
5061  goto error_rem_allvols;
5062  }
5063  error_code = disk_manager_init (thread_p, true);
5064  if (error_code != NO_ERROR)
5065  {
5066  goto error_rem_allvols;
5067  }
5068 
5069  log_restart_emergency (thread_p, db_fullname, log_path, log_prefix);
5070 
5071  (void) boot_remove_all_temp_volumes (thread_p, ONLY_PHYSICAL_REMOVE_TEMP_VOL_ACTION);
5072  boot_server_status (BOOT_SERVER_UP);
5073  log_final (thread_p);
5074 
5075  }
5076 
5077  /* Now delete the database */
5078  error_code = logpb_delete (thread_p, boot_Db_parm->nvols, db_fullname, log_path, log_prefix, force_delete);
5079  return error_code;
5080 
5081 error_rem_allvols:
5082 
5083  error_code = logpb_delete (thread_p, -1, db_fullname, log_path, log_prefix, force_delete);
5084 
5085  return error_code;
5086 }

5088 /*
5089  * xboot_emergency_patch () - patch the database for emergency restart
5090  *
5091  * return: NO_ERROR if all OK, ER_ status otherwise
5092  *
5093  * db_name(in): Database Name
5094  * recreate_log(in): true if the log is missing
5095  * log_npages(in):

5100  * remove any indication of recovery to be performed. If a log
5101  * is not available, the recreate_flag must be given
5102  */
5103 int
5104 xboot_emergency_patch (const char *db_name, bool recreate_log, DKNPAGES log_npages, const char *db_locale,
5105  FILE * out_fp)
5106 {
5107  char log_path[PATH_MAX];
5108  const char *log_prefix;

5114  INTL_CODESET db_charset_db_header = INTL_CODESET_ERROR;
5115  INTL_CODESET db_charset_db_root = INTL_CODESET_ERROR;
5116  char dummy_timezone_checksum[32 + 1];
5117  char db_lang[LANG_MAX_LANGNAME];
5118  THREAD_ENTRY *thread_p = NULL;
5119 
5120  if (lang_init () != NO_ERROR)
5121  {
5122  if (er_errid () == NO_ERROR)
5123  {
5124  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, ER_LOC_INIT, 1, "Failed to initialize language module");
5125  }
5126  error_code = ER_LOC_INIT;
5127  goto error_exit;
5128  }
5129 
5130  (void) msgcat_init ();
5131  if (sysprm_load_and_init (NULL, NULL, SYSPRM_LOAD_ALL) != NO_ERROR)

5134  error_code = ER_BO_CANT_LOAD_SYSPRM;
5135  goto error_exit;
5136  }

5138  if (db_name == NULL)

5141  error_code = ER_BO_UNKNOWN_DATABASE;
5142  goto error_exit;
5143  }
5144 
5145  /* *INDENT-OFF* */
5146  cubthread::initialize (thread_p);
5147  error_code = cubthread::initialize_thread_entries ();
5148  if (error_code != NO_ERROR)

5150  ASSERT_ERROR ();

5152  }

5154 
5155  /*
5156  * Compose the full name of the database and find location of logs
5157  */

5160  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, ER_CFG_NO_FILE, 1, DATABASES_FILENAME);
5161  error_code = ER_CFG_NO_FILE;
5162  goto error_exit;
5163  }
5164 
5165  if (dir == NULL || ((db = cfg_find_db_list (dir, db_name)) == NULL))
5166  {
5167  /*
5168  * Make sure that nobody was in the process of writing the
5169  * database.txt when we got a snapshot of it.
5170  */
5171  if (dir != NULL)
5172  {
5173  cfg_free_directory (dir);
5174  dir = NULL;
5175  }
5176 
5177  if (cfg_maycreate_get_directory_filename (dbtxt_label) != NULL
5178 #if !defined(WINDOWS) || !defined(DONT_USE_MANDATORY_LOCK_IN_WINDOWS)
5179  /* Temporary solution to NT file locking problem. */
5180  && (dbtxt_vdes = fileio_mount (thread_p, dbtxt_label, dbtxt_label, LOG_DBTXT_VOLID, 2, true)) != NULL_VOLDES
5181 #endif /* !WINDOWS || !DONT_USE_MANDATORY_LOCK_IN_WINDOWS */
5182  )
5183  {
5184  if (dbtxt_vdes != NULL_VOLDES)
5185  {
5186  if (cfg_read_directory_ex (dbtxt_vdes, &dir, false) == NO_ERROR)
5187  {
5188  db = cfg_find_db_list (dir, db_name);
5189  }
5190  }
5191  else
5192  {
5193  if (cfg_read_directory (&dir, false) == NO_ERROR)
5194  {
5195  db = cfg_find_db_list (dir, db_name);
5196  }
5197  }
5198 
5199  fileio_dismount (thread_p, dbtxt_vdes);
5200  dbtxt_vdes = NULL_VOLDES;
5201  }
5202  if (db == NULL)
5203  {
5204  if (dir != NULL)
5205  {
5206  cfg_free_directory (dir);
5207  }
5208  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, ER_BO_UNKNOWN_DATABASE, 1, db_name);
5209  error_code = ER_BO_UNKNOWN_DATABASE;
5210  goto error_exit;
5211  }
5212  }
5213 
5214  COMPOSE_FULL_NAME (boot_Db_full_name, sizeof (boot_Db_full_name), db->pathname, db_name);
5215 
5216  if (boot_volume_info_log_path (log_path) == NULL)
5217  {
5218  strcpy (log_path, db->logpath);
5219  }
5220 
5221  cfg_free_directory (dir);
5222 
5223  log_prefix = fileio_get_base_file_name (db_name);
5224 
5225  if (sysprm_load_and_init (boot_Db_full_name, NULL, SYSPRM_LOAD_ALL) != NO_ERROR)
5226  {
5227  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, ER_BO_CANT_LOAD_SYSPRM, 0);
5228  error_code = ER_BO_CANT_LOAD_SYSPRM;
5229  goto error_exit;
5230  }
5231 
5232  /*
5233  * Initialize error structure, critical section, slotted page, heap, and
5234  * recovery managers
5235  */
5236 
5237  /* The database pagesize is set by log_get_io_page_size */
5238 
5239  if (log_get_io_page_size (thread_p, boot_Db_full_name, log_path, log_prefix) == -1)
5240  {
5241  if (recreate_log != 0)
5242  {
5243  /*
5244  * User must indicate the database pagesize through its own environment
5245  */
5246  (void) db_set_page_size (IO_DEFAULT_PAGE_SIZE, IO_DEFAULT_PAGE_SIZE);
5247  }
5248  else
5249  {
5250  error_code = ER_FAILED;
5251  goto error_exit;
5252  }

5256  logtb_define_trantable (thread_p, -1, -1);
5257 
5258  error_code = spage_boot (thread_p);
5259  if (error_code != NO_ERROR)
5260  {
5261  goto error_exit;
5262  }

5264  if (error_code != NO_ERROR)
5265  {
5266  goto error_exit;
5267  }
5268

5270  error_code = boot_mount (thread_p, LOG_DBFIRST_VOLID, boot_Db_full_name, NULL);
5271  if (error_code != NO_ERROR)
5272  {
5273  goto error_exit;
5274  }
5275 
5276  /* Find the location of the database parameters and read them */
5277  if (disk_get_boot_hfid (thread_p, LOG_DBFIRST_VOLID, &boot_Db_parm->hfid) == NULL)
5278  {
5279  error_code = ER_FAILED;
5280  goto error_exit;
5281  }
5282  error_code = boot_get_db_parm (thread_p, boot_Db_parm, boot_Db_parm_oid);
5283  if (error_code != NO_ERROR)
5284  {
5285  error_code = ER_FAILED;
5286  goto error_exit;
5287  }
5288 
5289  if (recreate_log == false)
5290  {
5291  db_charset_db_header = boot_get_db_charset_from_header (thread_p, log_path, log_prefix);
5292  if (db_charset_db_header <= INTL_CODESET_NONE || INTL_CODESET_LAST < db_charset_db_header)
5293  {
5294  char er_msg[ERR_MSG_SIZE];
5295  snprintf (er_msg, sizeof (er_msg) - 1,
5296  "Cannot found a valid charset in volumes header or there is a missmatch.");
5297  er_set (ER_FATAL_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, ER_LOC_INIT, 1, er_msg);
5298  error_code = ER_LOC_INIT;
5299  goto error_exit;
5300  }
5301  else
5302  {
5303  lang_set_charset (db_charset_db_header);
5304  }
5305  }
5306  else
5307  {
5308  error_code = lang_set_charset_lang (db_locale);
5309  if (error_code != NO_ERROR)
5310  {
5311  goto error_exit;
5312  }
5313  db_charset_db_header = lang_charset ();
5314  }
5315 
5316  /* Find the rest of the volumes and mount them */
5317 
5318  error_code = boot_find_rest_volumes (thread_p, NULL, LOG_DBFIRST_VOLID, boot_mount, NULL);
5319  if (error_code != NO_ERROR)
5320  {
5321  goto error_exit;
5322  }
5323  error_code = disk_manager_init (thread_p, true);
5324  if (error_code != NO_ERROR)
5325  {
5326  ASSERT_ERROR ();
5327  goto error_exit;
5328  }
5329 
5330  error_code = logtb_initialize_global_unique_stats_table (thread_p);
5331  if (error_code != NO_ERROR)
5332  {
5333  goto error_exit;
5334  }

5336  error_code = file_tracker_load (thread_p, &boot_Db_parm->trk_vfid);
5337  if (error_code != NO_ERROR)

5339  ASSERT_ERROR ();

5341  }
5342  catalog_initialize (&boot_Db_parm->ctid);
5343 
5344  if (prm_get_bool_value (PRM_ID_DISABLE_VACUUM) == false)
5345  {
5346  /* We need initialize vacuum routine before recovery. */
5347  error_code =
5348  vacuum_initialize (thread_p, boot_Db_parm->vacuum_log_block_npages, &boot_Db_parm->vacuum_data_vfid,
5349  &boot_Db_parm->dropped_files_vfid);

5351  {
5352  goto error_exit;
5353  }
5354  }

5357  if (error_code != NO_ERROR)

5360  }

5365  }

5368  * Initialize the catalog manager, the query evaluator, and install meta
5369  * classes
5370  */
5371 
5372  error_code = locator_initialize (thread_p);
5373  if (error_code != NO_ERROR)
5374  {
5375  goto error_exit;
5376  }
5377 
5378  oid_set_root (&boot_Db_parm->rootclass_oid);
5379 
5380  /* Initialize tsc-timer */
5381  tsc_init ();
5382 
5383  error_code =
5384  catcls_get_server_compat_info (thread_p, &db_charset_db_root, db_lang, sizeof (db_lang) - 1,
5385  dummy_timezone_checksum);
5386  if (error_code != NO_ERROR)
5387  {
5388  goto error_exit;
5389  }
5390

5392  {

5395  lang_charset_cubrid_name (db_charset_db_header), lang_charset_cubrid_name (db_charset_db_root));
5396  er_set (ER_FATAL_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, ER_LOC_INIT, 1, er_msg);
5397  error_code = ER_LOC_INIT;
5398  goto error_exit;
5399  }
5400 
5401  if (recreate_log == true)
5402  {
5403  if (log_npages <= 0)
5404  {

5406  log_npages = xdisk_get_total_numpages (thread_p, LOG_DBFIRST_VOLID);
5407 
5408  if (log_npages < 10)
5409  {
5410  log_npages = 10;
5411  }
5412  }
5413

5415  if (error_code != NO_ERROR)

5418  }
5419  }

5426  return error_code;
5427 
5428 error_exit:

5431  {
5432  error_code = ER_FAILED;
5433  }

5439 
5440 /*
5441  * boot_find_new_db_path () - find the new path of database
5442  *
5443  * return: db_pathbuf or NULL
5444  *
5445  * db_pathbuf(in): The database path buffer (Set as a side effect)
5446  * The size of this buffer muts be at least PATH_MAX
5447  * fileof_vols_and_wherepaths(in):A file of volumes and path or NULL.
5448  * Each volume entry consists of:
5449  * volid from_fullvolname to_fullvolname
5450  *
5451  * Note: Find the new database path from either the given wherepath
5452  * file or the current working directory.
5453  */
5454 static char *
5455 boot_find_new_db_path (char *db_pathbuf, const char *fileof_vols_and_wherepaths)
5456 {
5457  FILE *where_paths_fp;
5458  char from_volname[PATH_MAX]; /* Name of new volume */
5459  int from_volid;
5460  char *name;
5461  char format_string[32];
5462 #if !defined(WINDOWS)
5463  struct stat stat_buf;
5464 #endif
5465 
5466  if (fileof_vols_and_wherepaths != NULL)
5467  {
5468  /*
5469  * Obtain the new database path from where paths file
5470  */
5471  where_paths_fp = fopen (fileof_vols_and_wherepaths, "r");
5472  if (where_paths_fp == NULL)
5473  {
5474  er_set_with_oserror (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, ER_LOG_USER_FILE_UNKNOWN, 1,
5475  fileof_vols_and_wherepaths);
5476  return NULL;
5477  }
5478 
5479  *db_pathbuf = '\0';
5480  *from_volname = '\0';
5481 
5482  sprintf (format_string, "%%d %%%ds %%%ds", PATH_MAX - 1, PATH_MAX - 1);
5483  if (fscanf (where_paths_fp, format_string, &from_volid, from_volname, db_pathbuf) != 3
5484  || from_volid != LOG_DBFIRST_VOLID)
5485  {
5486  fclose (where_paths_fp);
5487  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, ER_LOG_USER_FILE_UNORDERED_ENTRIES, 7, fileof_vols_and_wherepaths,
5488  0, from_volid, from_volname, db_pathbuf, LOG_DBFIRST_VOLID, boot_Db_full_name);
5489  return NULL;
5490  }
5491  fclose (where_paths_fp);
5492 
5493 #if !defined(WINDOWS)
5494  if (stat (db_pathbuf, &stat_buf) != -1 && S_ISCHR (stat_buf.st_mode))
5495  {
5496  if (getcwd (db_pathbuf, PATH_MAX) == NULL)
5497  {
5498  er_set_with_oserror (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, ER_BO_CWD_FAIL, 0);
5499  *db_pathbuf = '0';
5500  return NULL;
5501  }
5502 
5503  return db_pathbuf;
5504  }
5505 #endif /* !WINDOWS */
5506 
5507  name = strrchr (db_pathbuf, PATH_SEPARATOR);
5508 #if defined(WINDOWS)
5509  {
5510  char *name_tmp = strrchr (db_pathbuf, '/');
5511 
5512  if (name < name_tmp)
5513  {
5514  name = name_tmp;
5515  }
5516  }
5517 #endif /* WINDOWS */
5518  if (name == NULL)
5519  {
5520  /* It does not look like a path name. Use working directory */
5521  if (getcwd (db_pathbuf, PATH_MAX) == NULL)
5522  {
5523  er_set_with_oserror (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, ER_BO_CWD_FAIL, 0);
5524  *db_pathbuf = '\0';
5525  return NULL;
5526  }
5527  }
5528  else
5529  {
5530  *name = '\0';
5531  }
5532  }
5533  else
5534  {
5535  /* Use current working directory */
5536  if (getcwd (db_pathbuf, PATH_MAX) == NULL)
5537  {
5538  er_set_with_oserror (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, ER_BO_CWD_FAIL, 0);
5539  *db_pathbuf = '\0';
5540  return NULL;
5541  }
5542  }
5543 
5544  return db_pathbuf;
5545 }
5546 
5547 /*
5548  * boot_volume_info_log_path () - find path for log in volinfo
5549  *
5550  * return: log_path or NULL
5551  *
5552  * log_path(in): Storage for log path
5553  *
5554  * Note: Find path for the log in the volume information.
5555  */
5556 static char *
5557 boot_volume_info_log_path (char *log_path)
5558 {
5559  int read_int_volid = NULL_VOLID;
5560  char *slash;
5561  FILE *volinfo_fp = NULL; /* Pointer to new volinfo */
5562  char format_string[32];
5563 
5564  fileio_make_volume_info_name (log_path, boot_Db_full_name);
5565  volinfo_fp = fopen (log_path, "r");
5566  if (volinfo_fp == NULL)
5567  {
5568  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, ER_BO_CANNOT_FINE_VOLINFO, 1, log_path);
5569  return NULL;
5570  }
5571 
5572  sprintf (format_string, "%%d %%%ds", PATH_MAX - 1);
5573  while (true)
5574  {
5575  if (fscanf (volinfo_fp, format_string, &read_int_volid, log_path) != 2)
5576  {
5577  read_int_volid = NULL_VOLID;
5578  break;
5579  }
5580  if (LOG_DBLOG_ACTIVE_VOLID == (VOLID) read_int_volid)
5581  {
5582  break;
5583  }
5584  }
5585  fclose (volinfo_fp);
5586 
5587  if (LOG_DBLOG_ACTIVE_VOLID == (VOLID) read_int_volid)
5588  {
5589  slash = strrchr (log_path, PATH_SEPARATOR);
5590 #if defined(WINDOWS)
5591  {
5592  char *r_slash = strrchr (log_path, '/');
5593 
5594  if (slash < r_slash)
5595  {
5596  slash = r_slash;
5597  }
5598  }
5599 #endif /* WINDOWS */
5600  if (slash != NULL)
5601  {
5602  *slash = '\0';
5603  }
5604  return log_path;
5605  }
5606 
5607  return NULL;
5608 }

5682 /*
5683  * boot_get_db_charset_from_header () - Get DB charset from volumes
5684  * (log or generic)
5685  * return: charset
5686  * thread_p(in):
5687  * log_path(in):
5688  * log_prefix(in):
5689  */
5690 static INTL_CODESET
5691 boot_get_db_charset_from_header (THREAD_ENTRY * thread_p, const char *log_path, const char *log_prefix)
5692 {
5693  INTL_CODESET vol_header_db_charset = INTL_CODESET_ERROR;
5694  INTL_CODESET log_header_db_charset = INTL_CODESET_ERROR;
5695 
5696  log_header_db_charset =
5697  (INTL_CODESET) log_get_charset_from_header_page (thread_p, boot_Db_full_name, log_path, log_prefix);
5698 
5699  if (disk_get_boot_db_charset (thread_p, LOG_DBFIRST_VOLID, &vol_header_db_charset) != NO_ERROR)
5700  {
5701  vol_header_db_charset = INTL_CODESET_ERROR;
5702  }
5703 
5704  if (log_header_db_charset == INTL_CODESET_ERROR)
5705  {
5706  return vol_header_db_charset;
5707  }
5708  else if (vol_header_db_charset == INTL_CODESET_ERROR)
5709  {
5710  return log_header_db_charset;
5711  }
5712  else if (vol_header_db_charset != log_header_db_charset)
5713  {
5714  return INTL_CODESET_ERROR;
5715  }
5716 
5717  assert (vol_header_db_charset == log_header_db_charset);
5718 
5719  return vol_header_db_charset;
5720 }
